Articles.Content:
Hi everyone

You may have noticed by now that the support forum has a few new colours, one for each supported OS and a darker version for solved threads.

The default tag was changed to Windows, so if your issue is with Linux or OSX please edit your thread accordingly.

The default tag was changed to Windows, so if your issue is with Linux or OSX please edit your thread accordingly.

Done.

Any chance of higher contrast tag colors? The dark blue for Windows works well against the forum's grey, but the Linux orange and OS X gray are hard to read. I'd suggest:

[support - Windows] (same)

[support - Linux] (0xff6600)

[support - OS X] (0x666666)
